fields.name: certFile
fields.description: A file containing the certificate

fields.name: keyFile
fields.description: A file containing the private key in PKCS8 format

fields.name: keyPassword
fields.description: Password of the private key if it is encrypted

records.name: CertKey
records.description: Represents a combination of the certificate, private key, and private key password (if encrypted).

fields.name: localHost
fields.description: Local binding of the interface

fields.name: timeout
fields.description:
The socket reading timeout value to be used in seconds. If this is not set, the default value
of 300 seconds(5 minutes) will be used

fields.name: writeTimeout
fields.description:
The socket write timeout value to be used in seconds. If this is not set, the default value
of 300 seconds(5 minutes) will be used

fields.name: secureSocket
fields.description: The `secureSocket` configuration

records.name: ClientConfiguration
records.description: Configurations for the connection-oriented TCP client.

fields.name: enable
fields.description: Enable SSL validation

fields.name: cert
fields.description: Configurations associated with `crypto:TrustStore` or single certificate file that the client trusts

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: SSL/TLS protocol related options

fields.name: ciphers
fields.description:
List of ciphers to be used
eg: TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA

fields.name: handshakeTimeout
fields.description: SSL handshake time out

fields.name: sessionTimeout
fields.description: SSL session time out

records.name: ClientSecureSocket
records.description: Secure Socket configuration for TCP Client.

fields.name: localHost
fields.description: The hostname

fields.name: secureSocket
fields.description: The SSL configurations for the listener

records.name: ListenerConfiguration
records.description: Provides a set of configurations for tcp listener.

fields.name: key
fields.description: Configurations associated with `crypto:KeyStore` or combination of certificate and (PKCS8) private key of the server

fields.name: protocol
fields.description: SSL/TLS protocol related options

fields.name: ciphers
fields.description:
List of ciphers to be used
eg: TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA

fields.name: handshakeTimeout
fields.description: SSL handshake time out

fields.name: sessionTimeout
fields.description: SSL session time out

records.name: ListenerSecureSocket
records.description: Secure Socket configuration for TCP Listener.

objectTypes.name: ConnectionService
objectTypes.description: Represent TCP Listener ConnectionService service type.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data need to be sent to the remote host

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` if the given data cannot be sent

remoteMethods.name: writeBytes
remoteMethods.description: Sends the response as byte[] to the same remote host.

returnParameters.description:
`()` or else a `tcp:Error` if the connection cannot be properly
closed

fields.name: remoteHost
fields.description: The hostname or the IP address of the remote host

fields.name: remotePort
fields.description: The port number of the remote host

fields.name: localHost
fields.description: The bound hostname

fields.name: localPort
fields.description: The port number to which the socket is bound

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique ID associated with the connection

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data need to be sent to the remote host

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` if the given data cannot be sent

methods.name: writeBytes

`()` or else a `tcp:Error` if the connection cannot be properly

clients.name: Caller
clients.description: Represents caller object in tcp service remote methods.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data that need to be sent to the connected remote host

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` if the given data cannot be sent

remoteMethods.name: writeBytes
remoteMethods.description:
Sends the given data to the connected remote host.
```ballerina
tcp:Error? result = socketClient->writeBytes("msg".toBytes());
```

returnParameters.description:
The `readonly & byte[]` or else a `tcp:Error` if the data
cannot be read from the remote host

remoteMethods.name: readBytes
remoteMethods.description:
Reads data only from the connected remote host. 
```ballerina
(readonly & byte[])|tcp:Error result = socketClient->readBytes();
```

returnParameters.description: A `tcp:Error` if it cannot close the connection or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: close
remoteMethods.description:
Frees up the occupied socket.
```ballerina
tcp:Error? closeResult = socketClient->close();
```

parameters.name: remoteHost
parameters.description: The hostname or the IP address of the remote host

parameters.name: remotePort
parameters.description: The port number of the remote host

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Connection-oriented client-related configurations

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initializes the TCP client based on the provided configurations.
```ballerina
tcp:Client|tcp:Error? socketClient = new("www.remote.com", 80,
                             localHost = "localHost");
```

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data that need to be sent to the connected remote host

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` if the given data cannot be sent

methods.name: writeBytes
methods.description:
Sends the given data to the connected remote host.
```ballerina
tcp:Error? result = socketClient->writeBytes("msg".toBytes());
```

returnParameters.description:
The `readonly & byte[]` or else a `tcp:Error` if the data
cannot be read from the remote host

methods.name: readBytes
methods.description:
Reads data only from the connected remote host. 
```ballerina
(readonly & byte[])|tcp:Error result = socketClient->readBytes();
```

returnParameters.description: A `tcp:Error` if it cannot close the connection or else `()`

methods.name: close
methods.description:
Frees up the occupied socket.
```ballerina
tcp:Error? closeResult = socketClient->close();
```

parameters.description: The hostname or the IP address of the remote host

parameters.name: remotePort
parameters.description: The port number of the remote host

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Connection-oriented client-related configurations

initMethod.name: init

Initializes the TCP client based on the provided configurations.

tcp:Client|tcp:Error? socketClient = new("www.remote.com", 80,
                             localHost = "localHost");

clients.name: Client
clients.description: Initializes the TCP connection client based on the provided configurations.

parameters.name: tcpService
parameters.description: Type descriptor of the service

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the service

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` upon failure to register the listener

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description:
Binds a service to the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.attach(helloService);
```

parameters.name: localPort
parameters.description: The port number of the remote service

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Configurations related to the `tcp:Listener`

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initializes the TCP listener based on the provided configurations.
```ballerina
 listener Listener|error? server1 = new (8080);
```

parameters.name: tcpService
parameters.description: Type descriptor of the service

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the service

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` upon failure to register the listener

methods.name: attach
methods.description:
Binds a service to the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.attach(helloService);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener starting process
An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stop process

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

parameters.name: tcpService
parameters.description: Type descriptor of the service

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` upon failure to detach the service

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Stops consuming messages and detaches the service from the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.detach(helloService);
```

parameters.name: localPort
parameters.description: The port number of the remote service

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Configurations related to the `tcp:Listener`

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Initializes the TCP listener based on the provided configurations.
```ballerina
 listener Listener|error? server1 = new (8080);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener starting process
An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

otherMethods.name: gracefulStop
otherMethods.description: Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener stop process

otherMethods.name: immediateStop
otherMethods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

parameters.name: tcpService
parameters.description: Type descriptor of the service

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `tcp:Error` upon failure to detach the service

otherMethods.name: detach
otherMethods.description:
Stops consuming messages and detaches the service from the `tcp:Listener`.
```ballerina
tcp:error? result = tcpListener.detach(helloService);
```

listeners.name: Listener
listeners.description:
This is used for creating TCP server endpoints. A TCP server endpoint is
capable of responding to remote callers. The `Listener` is responsible for
initializing the endpoint using the provided configurations.

modules.summary: This module provides APIs for sending/receiving messages to/from another application process (local or remote) over the connection-oriented TCP protocol.

modules.description: This module provides APIs for sending/receiving messages to/from another application process (local or remote) over the connection-oriented TCP protocol.
